description: Installation of replacement internal kitchen ventilation equipment consisting of an exhaust, vents and air conditioning condensers at ground floor level to rear elevation of the rear addition (Revised proposal).
subdivision_of_building: Consent relates to the use of the ground floor Class E premises.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The application submission as amended has failed to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Council that the ventilation equipment proposed could be operated safely and without resulting in increased noise and nuisance to the existing amenities of nearby residents contrary to the guidance set out in paragraphs 174 and 185 of the NPPF, policy D14 of the London Plan and DMPD policy DMS1 and Local Plan policies LP1, LP2 and LP14.

Reason : 2 - In dealing with this application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive manner and the Council has, as far as practicable, sought solutions to problems arising in relation to dealing with the planning application. We have made available detailed advice in the form of our statutory policies in the Local Plan consisting of the Core Strategy, Development Management Policies Document, Supplementary Planning documents and where appropriate the Site Specific Allocations Document as well as offering a full pre application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably. In addition further guidance was offered to the applicant by the case officer during the processing of the application to identify amendments to address those elements of the scheme considered unacceptable. However, the necessary amendments to make the application acceptable are substantial and would materially change the development proposal. They would require further consultations to be undertaken prior to determination, which could not take place within the statutory determination period specified by the Department of Communities and Local Government. You are therefore encouraged to consider submission of a fresh application incorporating the material amendments set out below which are necessary to make the scheme acceptable. 

Required amendments:
************************************************************
